dijital chayarupakaranaya kawada tharagayak diya hakida yanna ehi widhayakayan prashna kalawita sasan mahatha prayojanayata gaththe muwarge nithiyayi(pariganaka wala sakasum wegaya sama wasaraka deguna we) eya anumana karanne dijital thakshanaya ketharam wegayakin idiriyata gaman gannawada yannayi.ohuta 110 warna negatiw patayak samaga tharaga kirimata piksal miliyana 2ka pinthura ganime hakiyawa awashya wana athara, ohu asthamenthu kale wasara 15 ha 20k athara kalayak gatha wana bawayi.
